org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmaster

接口 JobManagerGateway

  • 所有超级接口:
    RestfulGateway, RpcGateway
    所有已知实现类:
    AkkaJobManagerGateway

    public interface JobManagerGateway
extends RestfulGateway
    Public JobManager gateway.

    This interface constitutes the operations an external component can trigger on the JobManager.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Cancels the given job.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.String> cancelJobWithSavepoint(JobID jobId, java.lang.String savepointPath, Time timeout)
      Cancels the given job after taking a savepoint and returning its path.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Integer> requestBlobServerPort(Time timeout)
      Requests the BlobServer port.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Optional<org.apache.flink.runtime.messages.JobManagerMessages.ClassloadingProps>> requestClassloadingProps(JobID jobId, Time timeout)
      Requests the class loading properties for the given JobID.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<JobsWithIDsOverview> requestJobsOverview(Time timeout)
      Requests the job overview from the JobManager.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Optional<Instance>> requestTaskManagerInstance(ResourceID resourceId, Time timeout)
      Requests the TaskManager instance registered under the given instanceId from the JobManager.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Collection<Instance>> requestTaskManagerInstances(Time timeout)
      Requests all currently registered TaskManager instances from the JobManager.

      Stops the given job.

      Submits a job to the JobManager.

        requestClusterOverview, requestJob, requestJobDetails, requestMetricQueryServicePaths, requestRestAddress, requestTaskManagerMetricQueryServicePaths

    • 方法详细资料

      • requestBlobServerPort

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Integer> requestBlobServerPort(Time timeout)
        Requests the BlobServer port.
        参数:
        timeout - for this operation
        返回:
        Future containing the BlobServer port

      • submitJob

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> submitJob(JobGraph jobGraph,
                                                              ListeningBehaviour listeningBehaviour,
                                                              Time timeout)
        Submits a job to the JobManager.
        参数:
        jobGraph - to submit
        listeningBehaviour - of the client
        timeout - for this operation
        返回:
        Future containing an Acknowledge message if the submission succeeded

      • cancelJobWithSavepoint

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.String> cancelJobWithSavepoint(JobID jobId,
                                                                                @Nullable
                                                                                java.lang.String savepointPath,
                                                                                Time timeout)
        Cancels the given job after taking a savepoint and returning its path. If the savepointPath is null, then the JobManager will use the default savepoint directory to store the savepoint in. After the savepoint has been taken and the job has been canceled successfully, the path of the savepoint is returned.
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the job to cancel
        savepointPath - Optional path for the savepoint to be stored under; if null, then the default path is taken
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the savepoint path of the taken savepoint or an Exception if the operation failed

      • cancelJob

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> cancelJob(JobID jobId,
                                                              Time timeout)
        Cancels the given job.
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the job to cancel
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing Acknowledge or an Exception if the operation failed

      • stopJob

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> stopJob(JobID jobId,
                                                            Time timeout)
        Stops the given job.
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the job to cancel
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing Acknowledge or an Exception if the operation failed

      • requestClassloadingProps

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Optional<org.apache.flink.runtime.messages.JobManagerMessages.ClassloadingProps>> requestClassloadingProps(JobID jobId,
                                                                                                                                                            Time timeout)
        Requests the class loading properties for the given JobID.
        参数:
        jobId - for which the class loading properties are requested
        timeout - for this operation
        返回:
        Future containing the optional class loading properties if they could be retrieved from the JobManager.

      • requestTaskManagerInstance

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Optional<Instance>> requestTaskManagerInstance(ResourceID resourceId,
                                                                                                Time timeout)
        Requests the TaskManager instance registered under the given instanceId from the JobManager. If there is no Instance registered, then Optional.empty() is returned.
        参数:
        resourceId - identifying the TaskManager which shall be retrieved
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the TaskManager instance registered under instanceId, otherwise Optional.empty()

      • requestTaskManagerInstances

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Collection<Instance>> requestTaskManagerInstances(Time timeout)
        Requests all currently registered TaskManager instances from the JobManager.
        参数:
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the collection of all currently registered TaskManager instances

      • requestJobsOverview

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<JobsWithIDsOverview> requestJobsOverview(Time timeout)
        Requests the job overview from the JobManager.
        参数:
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the job overview
